document.full_text: rapper ja rule pleaded guilty on tuesday to failing to file tax returns and promised to pay more than $1 million in back taxes and penalties, the u.s. attorney's office in new jersey said.
document.title: rapper ja rule pleads guilty to tax evasion
lines_and_colors: rapper ja rule pleaded guilty on tuesday to failing to file tax returns and promised to pay more than $1 million in back taxes and penalties, the u.s. attorney's office in new jersey said.
